Atuba Chief Varkees:
Tejakar Oroka! There are as many Orc tribes as there are stars in the night sky! However, noble blood flows through the veins of only 7 tribes. Listen well as I tell you their names!
The brave Hestui!
The merciless Atuba!
The unrelenting Neruga!
The strong-willed Urutu! The resourceful Duda-Mara!
And the ferocious Gandi!
There are also tribes of traitors whose names have been arased from our annals -- may they be forever disgraced!
